name: Star-computational-narrative
tagline: Github page that will list our resources for Computational Narrative
body:
### STAR - Computational Narrative Resources

Since we have a lot of running documents for our project, I decided to list them all here.

### Google Docs Pages

Presentation and Topic Breakdown Doc:
<https://docs.google.com/document/d/1DfpdSTWkkYiSVB706IqmYx5S81w6Gyd7LHi52-LniWM/edit>

Article Links:
<https://docs.google.com/document/d/1jpoAF1D3i5EzIA9rQP77VQgS3s2KB54haFiWsjN_gps/edit>

Citation Table:
<https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1a_u18rw5oyEN4T3AzHwhH8Fotw5nkaBt6vLjHCnIReM/edit#gid=0>

<https://docs.google.com/document/d/1k_nj4wSHKwX0YPfaksxXOYYoHzxJ84C1RiyKu-hFUw8/edit>

<https://docs.google.com/document/d/1K_XuWTj3S5mIz9BLl3k3pJY4OuC6k2fYCuD5C_UyLBg/edit>
